algorithm_technique: Use two pointers to iterate through sorted 2D arrays, merging based on IDs.
problem_summary_simple: Combine two sorted lists of [id, value] pairs, summing values for common IDs.
problem_summary_technical: Merge two sorted 2D arrays by ID using two pointers, summing values for matching IDs.
key_insights: The input arrays are already sorted by ID, which is key for a two-pointer approach.
When IDs match, sum the values; otherwise, append the entry with the smaller ID.
The result array needs to maintain the sorted order of IDs.
